name: Accounts Receivable
text: Gain ➒.
flavourText: If we don't receive payment in full by tomorrow, we'll be ogliged to repossess. But ... But the equipment's already been installed in our employees.

name: Annual Reviews
text: Draw three cards.
flavourText: Just between you and me, this wouldn't be a bad time to impose the boss with your initiative.

name: Audit of Call Records
text: Play only if Runner attempted two or more runs during his or her last turn. Trace5 - If trace is successful, give Runner a tag.

name: Chance Observation
text: Play only if Runner attempted a run during his or her last turn. Trace5 - If trace is successful, give Runner a tag.

name: Closed Accounts
text: Play only if Runner is tagged. Runner loses all bits.
flavourText: Watch out for the blast shelters First Eurobank builds around its ATMs. They may be great for the rubes, but if some corp has marked your account as illegal, The shelter will seal you in until the cops come. - Kiyote

name: Corporate Detective Agency
text: Play only if Runner is tagged. Trash up to two resources, at no cost.

name: Datapool® by Zetatech
text: Play only if Runner is tagged. Give Runner two tags.
flavourText: The enemy of your enemy is sometimes also your enemy.

name: Day Shift
text: Draw two cards and gain ➊.
flavourText: I'm sick of punching the clock. I want to punch my supervisor.

name: Edgerunner Inc. Temps
text: Gain three consecutive actions, which you may use only to install cards. You are not required to take all three of these actions.
flavourText: Just remember to sweep the fort for back doors once they're done.

name: Efficiency Experts
text: Gain ➌.
flavourText: Waste not, want not.

name: Falsified-Transactions Expert
text: Move up to three advancement counters from one card to another installed card that can be advanced.

name: Management Shake-Up
text: Add three advancement counters to any combination of installed cards that can be advanced.
flavourText: Don't be irreplaceable. If you can't be replaced, you can't be promoted.

name: Netwatch Credit Voucher
text: Play only if Runner is tagged. Give Runner a tag, and gain ➊.

name: New Blood
text: Conceal all revealed but unrezzed ice
flavourText: then rearrange your installed ice by swapping pairs of ice while Runner looks away. I hate newbie sysops. They always rearrange our ice into some weird configuration just because it matches some stupid question on their finals.

name: Night Shift
text: Gain ➋ and draw one card.
flavourText: It wasn't until my certification boards that it began to dawn on me that nights aren't infinitely long.

name: Off-Site Backups
text: Bring any card from the Archives into HQ.
flavourText: Data saved is eurobucks earned.

name: Overtime Incentives
text: Gain two actions.
flavourText: Hey, the door is stuck.

name: Planning Consultants
text: Look at the top five cards of R&D and arrange them in any order you choose.
flavourText: Chance favors the prepared mind. - Sir Isaac Newton

name: Power Grid Overload
text: Play only if Runner is tagged. Trash X pieces of hardware, other than cybernetics.

name: Project Consultants
text: Add four advancement counters to any combination of installed cards that can be advanced.

name: Punitive Counterstrike
text: Play only if Runner is tagged. Do 2 meat damage.
flavourText: Violence isn't always the best approached but it's often the most direct. - Anonymous WuTech VP

name: Scorched Earth
text: Play only if Runner is tagged. Do 4 meat damage.

name: Silver Lining Recovery Protocol
text: If any agendas were stolen during Runner's last turn, gain bits equal to three times the number of advancement counters those agendas had.

name: Systematic Layoffs
text: Add two advancement counters to any combination of installed cards that can be advanced.
flavourText: Yes, but what have you done for us this week?

name: Team Restructuring
text: Add one advancement counter to each of up to two installed cards that can be advanced.
flavourText: Executive ability is deciding quickly and getting somebody else to do the work.

name: Trojan Horse
text: Play only if Runner stole any agendas during his or her last turn. Give Runner a tag.
flavourText: The high-tech equivalent of a teller slipping a paint bomb into a money bag.

name: Urban Renewal
text: Play only if Runner is tagged. Do 5 meat damage.
flavourText: The paper work has been clearly posted in the basement closet of City Hall since last Thursday.

name: Aardvark
text: Runner cannot use worms during runs on this fort. If Runner uses a worm during a run on this fort before Aardvark is rezzed, you may rez Aardvark to trash that worm, and any bits spent using that worm on the current piece of ice are lost to no effect. Runner may then use further icebreakers to break the ice.

name: Antiquated Interface Routines
text: All ice on this fort has +1 strength

name: Bizzarre Encryption Scheme
text: Runner does not score any agenda (or agendas) on a run during which Bizarre Encryption Scheme is accessed
flavourText: return that agenda to the fort instead. Runner scores the agenda at the start of his or her next turn if neither you nor Runner has scored it by then. This does not affect any further runs.

name: Chester Mix
text: Cost to install ice on this fort is reduced by ➋.
flavourText: Of course, he subscribes to the Platonic-solids school of ice-rendering, but he is cheap.

name: Chimera
text: When Runner accesses Chimera, trash a daemon.
flavourText: Watch this. She likes to play with it before she trashes it.

name: Crybaby
text: When Runner accesses Crybaby, give Runner a Crying counter. Each Crying counter reduces Runner's link by 2 during each trace attempt. Runner can remove a Crying counter by taking an action to pay ➋.

name: Crystal Palace Station Grid
text: Runner must pay ➊, in addition to the normal cost, to break each subroutine of each piece of ice encountered during runs on this fort.nRez a region when you install it. Install a region only if you can pay to rez it. Only one region may be installed in each fort. Trash older ones.

name: Dedicated Response Team
text: When Runner accesses Dedicated Response Team, it does 3 meat damage. Ignore this effect unless Runner is tagged.
flavourText: Excuse me - that's my beeper.

name: Dieter Esslin
text: When Runner accesses Dieter Esslin, Dieter does 1 Net damage.
flavourText: Y'know, sometimes it worries me how much he enjoys his job.

name: Dr. Dreff
text: Whenever Runner makes a successful run on this fort, you may choose an ice card stored in HQ. Pay half of that card's rez cost, rounded down, to force Runner to encounter it
flavourText: the run is not considered successful unless Runner passes that piece of ice. Trash that ice after the encounter ends. Use this ability only once during each run on this fort.

name: Jenny Jett
text: Whenever Runner makes a successful run on this fort, you may choose an ice card stored in HQ. Install that piece of ice on this fort in the innermost position, paying an installation cost of ➊ for each piece of ice already on the fort. Runner is now considered to be approaching that piece of ice. Use this ability only once during each run on this fort.

name: Jerusalem City Grid
text: Cost to rez walls on this fort is reduced by ➋. All walls on this fort have +1 strength.nRez a region when you install it. Install a region only if you can pay to rez it. Only one region may be installed in each fort. Trash older ones.

name: Namatoki Plaza
text: Rez Namatoki Plaza when you install it. Install Namatoki Plaza only if you can pay to rez it. Install only inside a subsidiary data fort. That fort may have an additional agenda or node installed inside it. If Namatoki Plaza leaves play while installed, and this results in the fort having too many agendas and nodes installed inside it, trash one of those agendas or nodes.

name: New Galveston City Grid
text: All nodes and other upgrades installed inside this fort cost ➋, to trash, in addition to the normal cost.nRez a region when you install it. Install a region only if you can pay to rez it. Only one region may be installed in each fort. Trash older ones.

name: Olivia Salazar
text: For half cost, rounded down, rez a piece of ice installed on this fort. Derez that ice at the end of the run. Use this ability only once during each run on this fort.

name: Omni Kismet Ph.D
text: Swap a piece of unrezzed ice on this fort with an ice card stored in HQ. The new ice card comes into play concealed. Use this ability only once during each run on this fort.
flavourText: What the...?! That wasn't in the plans! - Epitaph

name: Paris City Grid
text: Put ➌ from the bank on Paris City Grid when you rez it. Use these bits only to pay for traces made during runs on this fort. If you use any of these bits, replace them at the start of your next turn.nRez a region when you install it. Install a region only if you can pay to rez it. Only one region may be installed in each fort. Trash older ones.

name: Red Herrings
text: Runner must pay ➎, in addition to any other costs, to steal agendas accessed from this fort, even on the run during which Runner trashes Red Herrings.
flavourText: Frack! It's easier to find things on my floor than in this mess.

name: Rio de Janeiro City Grid
text: Roll a die whenever Runner passes a piece of rezzed ice during a run on this fort. On a 1, end the run.nRez a region when you install it. Install a region only if you can pay to rez it. Only one region may be installed in each fort. Trash older ones.
flavourText: There's a new jungle in Brazil - the rusted-wire maze of telecom retrotech. Prepare to have your line dropped, and ...

name: Roving Submarine
text: Install only inside a subsidiary data fort. This fort may be run only if you installed or advanced a card inside or on this fort during your last turn.nRez a region when you install it. Install a region only if you can pay to rez it. Only one region may be installed in each fort. Trash older ones.

name: Singapore City Grid
text: Swap a piece of unrezzed ice on this fort with an ice card stored in HQ. The new ice card comes into play concealed. Use this ability only once during each run on this fort.nRez a region when you install it. Install a region only if you can pay to rez it. Only one region may be installed in each fort. Trash older ones.

name: Tesseract Fort Construction
text: All ice on this fort has an additional subroutine, *End the run unless Runner pays ➊, after all other subroutines.
flavourText: So are you upside down or am I?nDepends on how you look at it.

name: Tokyo-Chiba Infighting
text: Gain ➋ after each unsuccessful run on this fort.nRez a region when you install it. Install a region only if you can pay to rez it. Only one region may be installed in each fort. Trash older ones.

name: Turbeau Delacroix
text: Trace10 - If trace is successful, give Runner a tag. Use this ability only when Runner accesses Turbeau Delacroix, and only once during each run on this fort.

name: Twenty-Four-Hour Surveillance
text: During runs on this fort, Runner cannot use bits from stealth sources.

name: Washington D.C. City Grid
text: The difficulty of agendas installed inside this fort is reduced by 1.nRez a region when you install it. Install a region only if you can pay to rez it. Only one region may be installed in each fort. Trash older ones.

name: ACME Savings and Loan
text: Rezzing ACME S&L costs 1 agenda point, in addition to the normal cost. When you rez ACME S&L, gain [12] and trash ACME S&L. For the remainder of the game, pay ➊ at the end of each of your turns, or lose the game. You can remove this effect, and score 1 agenda point, by taking an action to pay [12].

name: BBS Whispering Campaign
text: Advertisment
flavourText: Put [16] from the bank on BBS Whispering Campaign when you rez it. When all the bits have been removed, trash BBS Whispering Campaign.nA: Take ➋ from BBS Whispering Campaign.

name: Blood Cat
text: A: Trace5 - If trace is successful, give Runner a tag.
flavourText: These break-ins are unacceptable. Put the Cat on him. I want this character tagged so tight we know when he sheds a hair!

name: Braindance Campaign
text: Put [12] from the bank on Braindance Campaign when you rez it. Take ➋ from Braindance Campaign at the start of each of your turns. When all the bits have been removed, trash Braindance Campaign.
flavourText: So it's a subliminal. What they don't know won't hurt them.

name: Chicago Branch
text: A, ➌: Add two advancement counters to an installed card that can be advanced.

name: City Surveillance
text: For each card Runner draws, give Runner a tag unless Runner pays ➊, in addition to any other costs, to avoid receiving that tag. You may rez City Surveillance just before the card is drawn.

name: Corporate Negotiating Center
text: At the start of each of your turns, gain ➊ for each agenda card stored in HQ that you show to Runner.
flavourText: That which does not get me fired makes me more valuable to the corporation. - Dave Michaels, Microtech Special Ops

name: Corprunner's Shattered Remains
text: You may advance Shattered Remains before and after you rez it. When Runner accesses Shattered Remains, it destroys one piece of hardware for each advancement counter on it.
flavourText: It's not that I like screwing you up. It's just that they got me wired so I feel the routines like bugs on my neck, so believe it, brother - I'm gonna swat!

name: Cowboy Sysop
text: A: Choose one of your installed cards to be uninstalled. Store it in HQ.

name: Data Masons
text: Cost to rez walls is reduced by ➋. All walls have +1 strength.
flavourText: An eye on top of a pyramid'? No, that's not our Net logo. You must have us confused with another outfit.

name: Department of Truth Enhancment
text: A: Put ➌ from the bank on Department of Truth Enhancement.nA: Take all the bits from Department of Truth Enhancement.
flavourText: We don't lie. We use statistics. - Scott H. Warner, Department Coordinator

name: Disinfectant Inc.
text: You may pay ➊ to avoid receiving a Virus counter. Use this ability only once each turn.

name: Encoder Inc.
text: Cost to rez code gates is reduced by ➊. All code gates have an additional subroutine, *End the run, after all other subroutines.

name: ESA Contract
text: A: Draw two cards.
flavourText: You know that orange toothpaste that suppresses your appetite? Yup, that came out of the space program too.

name: Euromarket Consortium
text: Hand size +2nA, ➊: Draw two cards.

name: Experimental AI
text: You may advance Experimental AI before and after you rez it. When Runner accesses Experimental AI, it destroys one program for each advancement counter on it.

name: Fortress Architects
text: Cost to install ice is reduced by ➊.
flavourText: You want us to build that? Not even God has the money to afford that!nYou're working for Saburo Arasaka, not God.

name: Hacker Tracker Central
text: After each trace attempt, whether successful or not, put ➊ from the bank on Hacker Tracker Central. During a trace attempt, each bit you spend from Hacker Tracker Central increases by 1 both your trace strength and your trace limit.

name: Holovid Campaing
text: Put [12] from the bank on Holovid Campaign when you rez it.Take ➊ from Holovid Campaign at the start of each of your turns. When all the bits have been removed, trash Holovid Campaign.

name: I Got a Rock
text: A, 3 Agenda points: Do 15 meat damage to Runner. Use this ability only if Runner has two or more tags.

name: Information Laundering
text: You may advance Information Laundering before and after you rez it.nA, T: Gain ➍ for each advancement counter on Information Laundering.
flavourText: Information wants to be clean

name: Investment Firm
text: Take ➊ from Investment Firm, if it has any bits, at the start of each of your turns. Whenever ➊ or more bits are added to your pool, you may put ➋ from the bank on Investment Firm for each ➊ you choose not to add to your pool. Effects that give you bits at the start of your turn cannot be used this way.

name: Krumz
text: Put ➊ from the bank on Krumz when you rez it. Use this bit only to pay for traces. If you use this bit, replace it at the start of your next turn.

name: Nevinyrral
text: Gain an action during each of your turns. If Nevinyrral leaves play while rezzed, you lose the game.nOnly one unique card of a particular name can be in play at a time. If for some reason more than one is in play, trash all but one.

name: Newsgroup Tauting
text: At the start of each run, Runner must pay ➊, in addition to any other costs, or end the run.

name: Omniscience Foundation
text: Give Runner a tag at the end of each turn during which Runner received a tag.

name: Pacifica Regional AI
text: You may advance Pacifica Regional AI before and after you rez it.nRegional AI advancement counter: Gain an action.

name: Remote Facility
text: Gain an action during each of your turns.
flavourText: While moving corporate Kartes to a remote location increases processing costs, it becomes easier to defend vital information against attempts at hostile acquisition. - David Samms, corporate consultant

name: Rescheduler
text: A: Note the number of cards stored in HQ. Shuffle those cards into R&D, and then draw that many cards.

name: Rockerboy Promotion
text: Put [15] from the bank on Rockerboy Promotion when you rez it. When all the bits have been removed, trash Rockerboy Promotion.nA: Take ➌ from Rockerboy Promotion.

name: Rustbelt HQ Branch
text: Hand size +2
flavourText: Systems are heavily monitored, and computer crime treated with draconian ferocity.' Sounds like Heaven.

name: Schlaghund
text: A: Roll a die. If you roll less than or equal to the number of tags Runner has, Schlaghund does 10 meat damage and you trash Schlaghund.
flavourText: Remember when your mother told you not to pet strange dogs? That's advice to live by.

name: Setup!
text: When Runner accesses Setup!, it does 2 Net damage, even if it is not installed. Ignore this effect if Runner accesses it from the Archives. If Setup! is accessed from R&D, Runner must show it to you.

name: Sk®lderviken SA Beta Test Site
text: Cost to rez black ice is reduced by ➋.
flavourText: When you rez this, it's very important that you have its administrator be there for it to imprint on him.

name: Solo Squad
text: A: Do 1 meat damage. Use this ability only if Runner is tagged.
flavourText: We don't break kneecaps. We derm the perps with mushroom derivative. It's more fun, more humane ... and much more devastating to their fine reflexes and thus their careers.

name: Sout African Mining Corp
text: A,A,A: Gain ➏.

name: Spinn® Public Relations
text: Take ➊ from Spinn® Public Relations, if it has any bits, at the start of each of your turns. A: Put ➌ from the bank on Spinn® Public Relations.
flavourText: Of course it's true! I saw it on the 'vid.

name: TRAP!
text: If you pay ➍ when Runner accesses TRAP!, it does 3 Net damage and gives Runner a tag, even if TRAP! is not installed. Ignore this effect if Runner accesses it from the Archives. If TRAP! is accessed from R&D, Runner must show it to you.

name: Vacant Soulkiller
text: You may advance Vacant Soulkiller before and after you rez it.When Runner accesses Vacant Soulkiller, it does 1 brain damage for each advancement counter on it.
flavourText: The original Soulkiller started as a matrix to contain artificial personalities, but Arasaka forced the original engineer to enhance the design for its own purpose.

name: Vapor Ops
text: You may advance Vapor Ops before and after you rez it.nVapor Ops advancement counter: Gain ➊.nA: Move any number of advance- ment counters from Vapor Ops to another installed card that can be advanced.

name: Virus Test Site
text: You may advance Virus Test Site before and after you rez it. When Runner accesses Test Site, it does 2 Net damage per advancement counter on it, or 1 Net damage if it has no counters, even if it is not installed or rezzed. Ignore this effect if Runner accesses it from the Archives. If Test Site is accessed from R&D, Runner must show it to you.

name: AI Chief Financial Officer
text: A: Shuffle cards stored in HQ and the Archives into R&D.then draw five cards.
flavourText: I think it's 'preferred' stock because their AI financial adviser prefers not to risk changing the board of directors!

name: Artificial Security Directors
text: Difficulty of Black Ops agendas is reduced by 1.
flavourText: We noticed a while ado that security directors developing cyberpsychosis - becoming less and less human - increased the effectiveness of our Black Ops dramatically. Unfortunately, they quickly became too unstable to be useful. This new program should solve all these problems, and more. - Erin Devlin, WuTech COO

name: Bioweapons Engineering
text: Each source of meat damage inflicts +1 meat damage.

name: Black Ice Quality Assurance
text: All black ice has +2strength.

name: Corporate Boon
text: Put four Boon counters on Corporate Boon when you score it. Boon counter: Gain an action. Use this ability only once per turn and only during your turn.

name: Corporate Coup
text: Put [15] from the bank on Corporate Coup when you score it. A: Take ➌ from Corporate Coup, if it has any bits.
flavourText: Here a new style of crime became manifest: death as administrative action. - Horst Kruger

name: Corporate Downsizing
text: When you score Corporate Downsizing, show to Runner any number of agenda cards stored in HQ. Gain bits equal to twice the combined agenda points of these cards.then shuffle them into R&D.
flavourText: Rightsizing.' The word is 'rightsizing.'

name: Corporate Retreat
text: You lose the following ability as soon as you rez or install any card.nA: Gain ➋.
flavourText: Hard work has a future payoff. Laziness pays off now.

name: Corporate War
text: If you have [12] or more bits in your pool when you score Corporate War, gain [12].otherwise, lose all bits.
flavourText: The greatest casualty of the early corporate wars was the middle class.

name: Data Fort Reclamation
text: Gain ➓ and choose up to four cards stored in HQ when you score Data Fort Reclamation. Create a new data fort using the cards chosen. Install the cards one at a time
flavourText: you may rez them when you install them. Then, return to the bank any of the ➓ not spent.

name: Detroit Police Contract
text: Put [12] from the bank on Detroit Police Contract when you score it. Take ➋ from Detroit Police Contract, if it has any bits, at the start of each of your turns.
flavourText: Corporate security forces are infamous for employing lethal force as a means of reducing overhead.

name: Employee Empowerment
text: You may choose to draw an additional card at the start of each of your turns.nA: Draw two cards.
flavourText: Be glad you don't get all the management the company pays for.

name: Encryption Breakthrough
text: All code gates have +1 strength. When you score Encryption Breakthrough, reveal as many code gates as you wish. Then, gain ➊ for each revealed or rezzed code gate.

name: Executive Extraction
text: Difficulty of Gray Ops agendas is reduced by 1.
flavourText: Sometimes an executive gets tired of waiting for doors to open within her organization, so she asks a rival corp to open the wall for her instead.

name: Genetics-Visionary Acquisition
text: Difficulty of Research agendas is reduced by 1.
flavourText: The more valuable you are to the corporation, the harder they fight to keep you: witness these casualty figures.

name: Hostile Takeover
text: Gain ➎ when you score Hostile Takeover.
flavourText: Tell the Director I'm sorry, but I can't seem to find any reference to 'intact' in the mercenaries' contract.

name: Ice Transmutation
text: Choose a piece of rezzed ice when you score Ice Transmutation. That ice now has +1 strength, and each subroutine on it is repeated once. Treat this as if each repeated subroutine appeared immediately after the original subroutine.

name: Main-Office Relocation
text: Hand size +2
flavourText: Corporate relocation efforts have become a much riskier proposition since the advert of the corporate war. Often, a corp's security teams will have to arrange armored convoys to prevent thefts.

name: Marine Arcology
text: A,A: Gain ➌.
flavourText: We could have accepted that bid, but in Nipponese wet real estate there're ultimately two kinds of construction: tsunami spec ... and bait bucket.

name: Netwatch Kartes Office
text: A: Trace2 - If trace is successful, give Runner a tag.
flavourText: These Netwatch goons are okay, but I'm thinking we should have started own police program instead.

name: On-Call Solo Team
text: A: Do 1 meat damage. Use this ability only if Runner is tagged.
flavourText: Corporate solo teams operate much like government death squads, with the primary difference being that solo teams aren't clumsy enough to let themselves be exposed.

name: Political Coup
text: Put [12] from the bank on Political Coup when you score it.nA: Take ➌ from Political Coup, if it has any bits.
flavourText: Assassination is the extreme form of censorship. - George Bernard Shaw, The Rejected Statement

name: Political Overthrow
text: A: Gain ➌.
flavourText: You know, these small island countries are becoming less and less of a challenge.

name: Polymer Breakthrough
text: Gain ➊ at the start of each of your turns.

name: Priority Requisition
text: You may rez a piece of ice, at no cost, when you score Priority Requisition.
flavourText: I just gave the big guy a rundown of last month's security breaches, and bingo! we've got a new budget.

name: Private Cybernet Police
text: A: Trace5 - If trace is successful, give Runner a tag.
flavourText: Seen a pink panda about yay high come through this BBS lately? No? Well, here's my hypercard anyway.if you notice anything unusual, just drop me a line.

name: Project Babylon
text: Score 1 additional agenda point for every two advancement counters over Project Babylon's difficulty that are on Project Babylon when you score it.

name: Security Net Optimization
text: Choose a fort when you score Security Net Optimization. That fort gives all ice installed on it +1 strength.
flavourText: Obsolete? Karte it ... yesterday.

name: Security Purge
text: Show the top three cards of R&D to Runner when you score Security Purge. If any of those cards are ice, install and rez them, at no cost. Trash the rest of those cards.

name: Strike Force Kali
text: A: Do 2 meat damage. Use this ability only if Runner is tagged.
flavourText: What's it mean? Kali's a hellacious goddess of destruction with multiple hands - you figure it out.

name: Subsidiary Branch
text: Gain an action during each of your turns.
flavourText: It's an off-site location for our creative talent;we call it 'the bomb shelter from bureaucracy.'

name: Superior Net Barriers
text: All walls have +1 strength. When you score Superior Net Barriers, reveal as many walls as you wish. Then, gain ➊ for each revealed or rezzed wall.

name: Tycho Extension
flavourText: Of course I fired him for playing games on duty! We can't have our sysops idling on the job. Remember the last time a corporation tried to extend the colony? A runner edited the blueprints, and the airlock system failed. Some asteroid miners spotted the bodies floating by 'bout a month ago.

name: Asp
text: *Trace5 - If trace is successful, end the run, and Runner cannot run again until Runner takes an action to pay ➊.
flavourText: Oh how sharper than a serpent's tooth is one of these suckers clamped onto the boot sector of a drive!

name: Ball and Chain
text: *For the remainder of the run, Runner must pay ➋ when encountering a piece of ice, in addition to any other costs, or end the run.

name: Banpei
text: *Trash a program.n*End the run.
flavourText: The survival of Bushido into cyberspace has spiritual significance to many execs.

name: Bolter Cluster
text: *Do 4 Net damage.n*Runner cannot break any subroutines of the next piece of ice encountered during the run.

name: Canis Major
text: *For the remainder of the run, all further ice is encountered at +2 strength.

name: Canis Minor
text: *For the remainder of the run, all further ice is encountered at +1 strength.

name: Cerberus
text: *Do 3 Net damage.n*Trace5 - If trace is successful, give Runner a Cerberus counter. Each Cerberus counter does 2 Net damage at the start of each run. Runner may remove a Cerberus counter by taking an action to spend ➍.n*End the run.

name: Cinderella
text: *Trace6 - If trace is successful, end the run, trash a piece of hardware, and do 2 meat damage. This damage cannot be prevented.

name: Code Corpse
text: *Do 1 brain damage.n*do 1 brain damage.
flavourText: Nothing turns a wannabe into a coulda-been faster then rewriting the forebrain from the inside out.

name: Cortical Scanner
text: *End the run.n*End the run.n*End the run.
flavourText: Your brain's the key.

name: Cortical Scrub
text: *Do 1 brain damage.n*End the run.
flavourText: Sounds nice and hygienic, eh?

name: Crystal Wall
text: *End the run.
flavourText: Yeah, the 'crystal' stuff is about as thick as walls get. But that just means the crunching noise are that much more gratifying when I hammer through it. - Kiyote

name: D'Arc Knight
text: *Trash a program.n*End the run.
flavourText: Do your worst, churl! I do not fear your best killers, your fastest evasion programs, your canniest AI routines. All of these I will face and defeat.

name: Data Darts
text: *Do 3 Net damage.n*Runner cannot break any subroutines of the next piece of ice encountered during the run.

name: Data Naga
text: *Trash a program.n*End the run.

text: *End the run.

text: *End the run.

name: Nerve Labyrinth
text: *Do 2 Net damage.n*End the run.
flavourText: If you're authorized, it's a smooth ride through;if you're not, you get a brain-twist of someone else's idea of normalcy. - Spider MurphynBut it's a great training ground for navigating wilderspace. - Rache Bartmoss

name: Neural Blade
text: *Do 1 Net damage.n*Runner cannot break any subroutines of the next piece of encountered during the run.

text: *End the run.

text: *End the run.

text: *Trash a program.n*End the run.
