name: Bargain with Viacox
text: After the turn in which you install Viacox, you gain an action during each of your turns, which you must take if possible. Roll a die at the start of each of your turns to find out what the action is. On a 1, draw a card. On a 2, gain ➊. On a 3, make a run on R&D. On a 4, make a run on HQ. On a 5, make a run on a subsidiary data fort. On a 6, reveal a card to the Corp at random from your hand, and play or install that card.

name: Bolt-Hole
text: [T]: Prevent 2 meat damage.nHidden resources are installed face down, but are put into the trash face up.
flavourText: Over threre1 BRRRRRRT! Take out that wall! Tink, tink, WHUMPF! Okay, looks clear.n(Whew!)nDid you hear something?

name: Chiba Bank Account
text: ➊, [T]: Gain ➍. You may use this ability whenever you pay any cost or penalty.nHidden resources are installed face down, but are put into the trash face up.
flavourText: We keep your money safe from prying eyes.-Chiba Mutual prospectus, edited draft for English-speaking investors

name: Credit Subversion
text: [T]: Trash, at no cost, all cards installed in a subsidiary data fort, even if they cannot normally be trashed. Use this ability only when you have just successfully made a run on that fort, and before accessing cards from that fort.nHidden resources are installed face down, but are put into the trash face up.
flavourText: What happened to that guy who used to clean the fish tanks?nHe had a family emergency in Crystal Palace right after that screw-up in Finance.

name: Death From Above
text: [T]: Trash, at no cost, all cards installed in a subsidiary data fort, even if they cannot normally be trashed. Use this ability only when you have just successfully made a run on that fort, and before accessing cards from that fort.nHidden resources are installed face down, but are put into the trash face up.

name: Expendable Family Member
text: ➊, [T]: Avoid receiving a tag.nHidden resources are installed face down, but are put into the trash face up.
flavourText: I'm an only child...now.

name: Get Ready to Rumble
text: [T]: The Corp discards two cards at random from HQ. Use this ability only when the Corp successfully does meat damage.nHidden resources are installed face down, but are put into the trash face up.

name: HQ Mole
text: ➍, [T]: Access two additional cards from HQ. Use this ability only when accessing cards from HQ.nHidden resources are installed face down, but are put into the trash face up.
flavourText: I've got low friends in high places.

name: Liberated Savings Account
text: ➐, [T]: Gain [11]. You may use this ability whenever you pay any cost or penalty.nHidden resources are installed face down, but are put into the trash face up.
flavourText: Honey, are you forgetting to record your credit transfers again?

name: Mercenary Subcontract
text: ➍, [T]: Trash, at no cost, one or more cards that you are currently accessing, even if those cards cannot normally be trashed.nHidden resources are installed face down, but are put into the trash face up.
flavourText: Now, remember to place the charges exactly where I tell you this time.

name: Precision Bribery
text: The Corp cannot create any new data forts. The Corp may trash Precision Bribery by taking an action to pay ➍. Only one unique card of a particular name can be in play at a time. If for some reason more than one is in play, trash all but one.

name: R&D Mole
text: ➍, [T]: Access two additional cards from R&D. Use this ability only when accessing cards from R&D.nHidden resources are installed face down, but are put into the trash face up.
flavourText: Don't worry-you'll have the time. The new game on the system will keep them distracted for hours.

name: Runner Sensei
text: ➋: Base link 4 ➋: +1 linknGain ➊ whenever you successfully use Runner Sensei to avoid a trace.nUse only one base link card for each trace attempt made against you.

name: Simulacrum
text: [T]: Pass a piece of AP ice. You may use this ability during an encounter with a piece of ice.nHidden resources are installed face down, but are put into the trash face up.

name: Streetware Distributor
text: Take ➊ from Streetware Distributor, if it has any bits, at the start of each of your turns.nA: Put ➌ from the bank on Streetware Distributor.
flavourText: Way it works is, you choose an object off the shelf, and I give you the download key when you pay. Or you shoplift it, and it downloads automatically...with the complimentary virus option.

name: Swiss Bank Account
text: You may use the following abilities whenever you pay any cost or penalty. [T]: Gain ➋.n➌, [T]: Gain ➏.nHidden resources are installed face down, but are put into the trash face up.

name: Time to Collect
text: [T]: Prevent one or more of your other installed resources from being trashed. Use this ability only during the Corp 's turn.nHidden resources are installed face down, but are put into the trash face up.

name: Wired Switchboard
text: [T]: +3 link. Use this ability only after you and the Corp have revealed how much each of you spent on the trace attempt.nHidden resources are installed face down, but are put into the trash face up.
flavourText: I use a lot more explosive than I need, so they think it's a random structure hit. There's no way to track all those down, so they usually don't bother.

name: Badtimes
text: Play only if Runner is tagged.nRunner's MU is reduced by 2 until end of turn
flavourText: They allways think it's a hoax.

name: Finders Keepers
text: Random
